original: ma h'a bra dyam g'i ra s'a dha nam /
analyzed: ma h'a bra dyam g'i ra s'a dha nam /

original: phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs /
analyzed: phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs /

original: 'phags ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: 'phags ma phyir bzlog pa chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo //

original: phyir bzlog pa chen mo sku mdog nag mo zhal gcig pa /
analyzed: phyir bzlog pa chen mo sku mdog nag mo zhal gcig pa /
translated: Mahāpratyangirā is black, with one face,

original: ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / mchog sbyin rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams na'o //
analyzed: ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / mchog sbyin rnams phyag g-yas pa rnams na'o //
translated: In her right hands she holds a sword, goad, and boon-granting gesture.

original: padma dmar po dang / rtse gsum dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs kar gnas pa ni phyag g-yon pa rnams na'o //
analyzed: padma dmar po dang / rtse gsum dang / zhags pa dang bcas pa'i sdigs mdzub thugs kar gnas pa ni phyag g-yon pa rnams na'o //
translated: In her left hands she holds a red lotus, trident, and threatening gesture with a noose at the heart.

original: sa bon ni h'um yig go //
analyzed: sa bon ni h'um yig go //

original: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /
analyzed: mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa /

original: lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: lang tsho gzhon zhing rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o //
translated: Youthful and adorned with all ornaments.

original: phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
analyzed: phyir bzlog pa chen mo'i sgrub thabs rdzogs so//
translated: The sādhana of Mahāpratyangirā is complete.
